comments.body: Prone to copy-paste bugs. Using `this.type` means if you copy and paste it to a different class, it does the right thing.
Since `this.type` has specific semantics and a few (apparently) weird behaviors in edge case, we opted to replace this with a simpler `this.getClass` and a factory method that takes a `Class[_]`.
